Random.name: Random
Random.description: Generates a random number between 0 and 1

RandomRange.name: Random Range
RandomRange.description: Generates a random number within a specified range

Sine.name: Sine
Sine.description: Finds the sine of an angle

Cosine.name: Cosine
Cosine.description: Finds the cosine of an angle

Tangent.name: Tangent
Tangent.description: Finds the tangent of an angle

ArcTangent.name: ArcTangent
ArcTangent.description: Finds the arctangent of a number

SquareRoot.name: SquareRoot
SquareRoot.description: Finds the square root of a number

NaturalLog.name: NaturalLog
NaturalLog.description: Finds the natural logarithm of a number

Power.name: Power
Power.description: Raises a number to a power

LessThan.name: LessThan
LessThan.description: Tests whether one number is less than another

LessEqual.name: LessEqual
LessEqual.description: Tests whether one number is less than or equal to another

GreaterThan.name: GreaterThan
GreaterThan.description: Tests whether one number is greater than another

GreaterEqual.name: GreaterEqual
GreaterEqual.description: Tests whether one number is greater than or equal to another

Equal.name: Equal
Equal.description: Tests whether two values are equal

NotEqual.name: NotEqual
NotEqual.description: Tests whether two values are not equal

And.name: And
And.description: Tests whether two conditions are both true

Or.name: Or
Or.description: Tests whether at least one of two conditions is true

Not.name: Not
Not.description: Inverts the truth value of a condition

Item.name: Get List Item
Item.description: Retrieves an element from a list

SetItem.name: Set List Item
SetItem.description: Sets the value of an element in a list

MakeVariable.name: Make Variable
MakeVariable.description: Creates a new variable and sets its value

Global.name: Global
Global.description: Declares a variable to be global

Repeat.name: Repeat
Repeat.description: Repeats a set of instructions a specified number of times

DoTimes.name: DoTimes
DoTimes.description: Repeats a set of instructions a specified number of times, with a counter variable

For.name: For
For.description: Repeats a set of instructions for each element in a list

If.name: If
If.description: Executes a set of instructions if a condition is true

IfElse.name: IfElse
IfElse.description: Executes one set of instructions if a condition is true, and another set if it is false
